{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = A8000 Gallery-1 FINAL-2022-NEW tcm148-143396.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Nighthawk® AXE3000 WiFi 6E USB 3.0 Adapter |caption2 = |pp = https://www.netgear.com/home/wifi/adapters/a8000/ |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = Netgear_A8000 |wikipedia = |brand = Netgear |model = A8000 |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 11/09/2023 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/Netgear_A8000 |sernum = |wlclass = AXE3000 |series = Nighthawk |if = USB |if_bus_version = 3.0 |ifconnector = Type A |formfactor = dongle |vendor_id = 0846 |device_id = 9060 |subvendor_id = |subdevice_id = |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = PY322200565 |icid = |us_id = |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = |chip1 = MediaTek;MT7921AUN; |chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = |antenna = |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac/ax |axqam = |802.11ax = 600/1201/1201 |acqam = |802.11ac = 867 |nqam = |802.11n = 300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 or 6 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = No |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = WiFi6/6E |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac+ax |accessible_UART = |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 08/29/2022 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B0B94R78N7 |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = Vietnam |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== 
    WiFi Technology : WiFi 6/6E (IEEE® 802.11ax) (AXE3000)
    2.4GHz AX: 2x2 (Tx/Rx) 1024/256-QAM 20/40MHz, up to 600Mbps
    5GHz AX: 2x2 (Tx/Rx) 1024/256-QAM 20/40/80, up to 1200Mbps
    New 6GHz AX: 2x2 (Tx/Rx) 1024/256-QAM 20/40/80, up to 1200Mbps
    WiFi Speed : AXE3000
    WiFi Range : Large homes
    USB 3.0 : Up to 10 times faster than USB 2.0
    Security : WPA3—Latest and cutting-edge WiFi security protocol
